author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
#### PR description:

Development of HLT menus for `CMSSW_12_6_X`.

This is the PR for the `master` branch, which will then be backported to `12_6_X` (the latter is now the release cycle used for HLT-menu development for Run 3; the development of HLT menus in `12_5_X` has come to a close).

This PR includes the integration of the following JIRA tickets.

  - [CMSHLT-2510](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2510): [TSG] set `MessageLogger.cerr.enableStatistics = False`
  - [CMSHLT-2579](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2579): [HIN] use `EvFFEDExcluder` for `rawPrimeDataRepacker`
  - [CMSHLT-2582](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2582): [TSG] add `hltOnlineMetaDataDigis` to `DQMHistograms` EndPath
  - [CMSHLT-2585](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2585): [TK-DPG] rename `PixelCPEFastESProducer` to `hltESPPixelCPEFast`

#### PR validation:

TSG tests.

#### If this PR is a backport, please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported, please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

`CMSSW_12_6_X`
title: HLT menu development for `12_6_X` (1/N) [`13_0_X`]
